title: YOU ARE GOING TO THE NETHER

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
Send the card(s) that have just been played by the last player to the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile.
- If a <:builder:1119843481700012103> or <:weapon:1107519313075785768> card was just played, double the recently played cards and send them to the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile.
- May also be played out of turn order if a <:builder:1119843481700012103>, <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899>, <:weapon:1107519313075785768>, or <:holy:1120560132150022184> card is played.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:orange:1106716206905438231> + <:pink:1106716301843497030> ):
fields.value:
Send the top 10 cards that are on the play pile to the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile.
- If any of the cards have the colors <:builder:1119843481700012103>, <:sprout:1118917438893985802>, <:weapon:1107519313075785768>, or <:arcana:1141474382905094215>, send 2 additional copies of those cards to the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile.
- May also be played out of turn order if a <:builder:1119843481700012103>, <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899>, <:weapon:1107519313075785768>, <:holy:1120560132150022184>, <:sprout:1118917438893985802>, <:arcana:1141474382905094215>, üï∞Ô∏è, or <:grave:1119394182310670366> was just played.
